00038 typedef struct char_table_entry_t {
00039   char* name;
00040   uint32_t ch;
00041 } char_table_entry_t;
00042 
00043 char_table_entry_t char_table[]={
00044   {"newline", '\n'},
00045   {"space", ' '},
00046 };

00048 typedef struct string_queue_t {
00049   char* buf;
00050   size_t all;
00051 } string_queue_t;
00052 
00053 static string_queue_t *create_queue(){
00054   string_queue_t *q = GC_MALLOC(sizeof(string_queue_t));
00055   q->buf = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(512);
00056   q->all = 512;
00057   if (!q->buf){
00058     abort();
00059   }
00060   q->buf[0]=0;
00061   return q;
00062 }
00063 static char* get_queue(string_queue_t *q){
00064   return q->buf;
00065 }
00066 static char* feed_queue(string_queue_t *q, char* data){
00067   size_t new_size = strlen(q->buf) + strlen(data)+1;
00068   if (new_size > q->all){
00069     q->buf = GC_REALLOC(q->buf, new_size+(new_size/2));
00070     q->all = new_size+(new_size/2);
00071     if (!q->buf){
00072       abort();
00073     }
00074   }
00075   strncat(q->buf, data, new_size);
00076 
00077 #ifdef Q_DEBUG
00078   printf(";; Queue is now: [[[%s]]] \n",get_queue(q));
00079 #endif
00080 
00081 }
00082 static void consume_queue(string_queue_t *q, char* new){
00083   size_t nl = strlen(new)+1;
00084   memmove(q->buf, new, nl);
00085 
00086 #ifdef Q_DEBUG
00087   printf(";; Trimmed: [[[%s]]]",new);
00088 #endif
00089 
00090   if (nl < q->all/2){
00091     q->buf = GC_REALLOC(q->buf, nl);
00092     q->all = nl;    
00093     if (!q->buf){
00094       abort();
00095     }
00096   }
00097 
00098 #ifdef Q_DEBUG
00099   printf(";; Queue is now: [[[%s]]] \n",get_queue(q));
00100 #endif
00101 
00102 
00103 }
00104 static void empty_queue(string_queue_t *q){
00105   if (q->buf){
00106     *(q->buf)=0;
00107   }
00108 }

00127 typedef struct parser_stack_t parser_stack_t;
00128 
00129 struct parser_stack_t {
00130   enum {
00131     P_LIST,
00132     P_DOT,
00133     P_PREEND,
00134     P_QUOTE,
00135     P_HASH,
00136     P_EVAL,
00137     P_DIRECTIVE
00138   } state;
00139 
00140   dfsch_object_t *front;
00141   dfsch_object_t *last;
00142   dfsch_object_t *tag;
00143 
00144   parser_stack_t *next;
00145 };

00147 struct dfsch_parser_ctx_t {
00148   string_queue_t *q;
00149 
00150   enum {
00151     T_ATOM, // i.e. number or symbol
00152     T_STRING,
00153     T_COMMENT,
00154     T_NONE,
00155     T_HASH,
00156     T_CHAR,
00157     T_CHAR_CONT,
00158   } tokenizer_state;
00159   
00160   parser_stack_t *parser;
00161 
00162   void *baton;
00163   dfsch_parser_callback_t callback;
00164 
00165   int error;
00166   int level;
00167   int line;
00168   int column;
00169 
00170   symbol_map_t* symbol_map;
00171   parser_directive_t* directives;
00172   dfsch_object_t* env;
00173   dfsch_object_t* source;
00174 };
00175 
00176 static void parser_reset(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx){
00177   empty_queue(ctx->q);
00178   ctx->tokenizer_state = T_NONE;
00179   ctx->parser = NULL;
00180   ctx->level = 0 ;
00181   ctx->line = 1;
00182   ctx->column = 1;
00183   ctx->error = 0;
00184 }
00185 
00186 static void parser_abort(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx, char* symbol){
00187   dfsch_object_t* pos = dfsch_cons(dfsch_make_number_from_long(ctx->line),
00188                                    dfsch_make_number_from_long(ctx->column));
00189 
00190   parser_reset(ctx);
00191   dfsch_error(symbol, pos);
00192 }
00193 static void parser_abort_ex(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx, dfsch_object_t* ex){
00194   parser_reset(ctx);
00195   dfsch_raise(ex);
00196 }
00197 
00198 dfsch_parser_ctx_t* dfsch_parser_create(){
00199   dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx = GC_MALLOC(sizeof(dfsch_parser_ctx_t));
00200   if (!ctx)
00201     return NULL;
00202 
00203   ctx->q = create_queue();
00204   if (!ctx->q){
00205     return NULL;
00206   }
00207 
00208   ctx->tokenizer_state = T_NONE;
00209   ctx->parser = NULL;
00210 
00211   ctx->line = 1;
00212   ctx->column = 1;
00213 
00214   ctx->level = 0 ;
00215   ctx->error = 0;
00216 
00217   ctx->symbol_map = NULL;
00218   ctx->env = 0;
00219   dfsch_parser_define_default_directives(ctx);
00220 
00221   return ctx;
00222 }
00223 
00224 static dfsch_object_t* make_symbol(dfsch_parser_ctx_t* ctx, char* sym){
00225   symbol_map_t* i = ctx->symbol_map;
00226 
00227   while (i){
00228     if (ascii_strcasecmp(sym, i->name) == 0){
00229       return i->symbol;
00230     }
00231     i = i->next;
00232   }
00233 
00234   return dfsch_make_symbol(sym);
00235 }
00236 
00237 void dfsch_parser_define_symbol(dfsch_parser_ctx_t* ctx, 
00238                                 char* name,
00239                                 dfsch_object_t* symbol){
00240   symbol_map_t* entry;
00241 
00242   entry = ctx->symbol_map;
00243   while (entry) {
00244     if (ascii_strcasecmp(name, entry->name) == 0){
00245       entry->symbol = symbol;
00246       return;
00247     }
00248     entry = entry->next;
00249   }
00250 
00251   entry = GC_NEW(symbol_map_t);
00252   entry->symbol = symbol;
00253   entry->name = name;
00254 
00255   entry->next = ctx->symbol_map;
00256   ctx->symbol_map = entry;
00257 }
00258 void dfsch_parser_undefine_symbol(dfsch_parser_ctx_t* ctx, 
00259                                   char* name){
00260   symbol_map_t* i = ctx->symbol_map;
00261   symbol_map_t* j;
00262 
00263   if (!i){
00264     return;
00265   }
00266 
00267   if (ascii_strcasecmp(name, i->name) == 0){
00268     ctx->symbol_map = i->next;
00269   }
00270 
00271   while (i){
00272     if (ascii_strcasecmp(name, i->name) == 0){
00273       j->next = i->next;
00274       return;
00275     }
00276     i = i->next;
00277   }  
00278 }
00279 void dfsch_parser_import_symbol(dfsch_parser_ctx_t* ctx,
00280                                 dfsch_object_t* symbol){
00281   char* name;
00282 
00283   name = rindex(dfsch_symbol(symbol), ':');
00284 
00285   if (name && name[1]!=0){
00286     dfsch_parser_define_symbol(ctx, name + 1, symbol);
00287   }
00288 }

00290 void dfsch_parser_callback(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx, 
00291                            dfsch_parser_callback_t callback,
00292                            void *baton){
00293 
00294   ctx->callback = callback;
00295   ctx->baton = baton;
00296 
00297 }
00298 void dfsch_parser_eval_env(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx, 
00299                            dfsch_object_t* env){
00300   ctx->env = env;
00301 }
00302 void dfsch_parser_define_directive(dfsch_parser_ctx_t* ctx, 
00303                                    dfsch_object_t* tag,
00304                                    dfsch_parser_directive_t directive,
00305                                    void* baton){
00306   parser_directive_t* entry = GC_NEW(parser_directive_t);
00307 
00308   entry->tag = tag;
00309   entry->directive = directive;
00310   entry->baton = baton;
00311 
00312   entry->next = ctx->directives;
00313   ctx->directives = entry;
00314 }
00315 void dfsch_parser_define_directive_cstr(dfsch_parser_ctx_t* ctx, 
00316                                         char* tag,
00317                                         dfsch_parser_directive_t directive,
00318                                         void* baton){
00319   dfsch_parser_define_directive(ctx, dfsch_make_symbol(tag), directive, baton);
00320 }
00321 void dfsch_parser_clear_directives(dfsch_parser_ctx_t* ctx){
00322   ctx->directives = NULL;
00323 }
00324 void dfsch_parser_clear_symbols(dfsch_parser_ctx_t* ctx){
00325   ctx->symbol_map = NULL;
00326 }
00327 
00328 static int directive_import(dfsch_parser_ctx_t* ctx, 
00329                             dfsch_object_t* args, 
00330                             void*baton){
00331   while (dfsch_pair_p(args)){
00332     dfsch_parser_import_symbol(ctx, dfsch_car(args));
00333     args = dfsch_cdr(args);
00334   }
00335 
00336   return 1;
00337 }
00338 
00339 void dfsch_parser_define_default_directives(dfsch_parser_ctx_t* ctx){
00340   ctx->directives = NULL;
00341   dfsch_parser_define_directive_cstr(ctx, "import", directive_import, NULL);
00342 }
00343 
00344 static void process_directive(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx,
00345                               dfsch_object_t* object){
00346   dfsch_object_t* tag;
00347   dfsch_object_t* args;
00348   dfsch_object_t* obj;
00349   parser_directive_t* i = ctx->directives;
00350 
00351   if (!dfsch_pair_p(object)){
00352     parser_abort(ctx, "parser-invalid-directive");
00353     return;
00354   }
00355 
00356   tag = dfsch_car(object);
00357   args = dfsch_cdr(object);
00358 
00359   while (i){
00360     if (i->tag == tag){
00361       if(!i->directive(ctx, args, i->baton)){
00362         parser_abort(ctx, "parser-invalid-directive");
00363       }
00364       return;
00365     }
00366     i = i->next;
00367   }
00368 
00369   parser_abort(ctx, "parser-invalid-directive");
00370 }
00371 
00372 static void parser_pop(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx){
00373   ctx->parser = ctx->parser->next;
00374   ctx->level--;
00375 }
00376 
00377 
00378 static void parser_push(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx){
00379   parser_stack_t *tmp = GC_MALLOC(sizeof(parser_stack_t));
00380 
00381   tmp->next = ctx->parser;
00382 
00383   ctx->parser = tmp;
00384   ctx->level++;
00385 }
00386 
00387 #define parse_object dfsch_parser_parse_object
00388 void dfsch_parser_parse_object(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx, dfsch_object_t* obj){
00389   if (ctx->parser){
00390     switch(ctx->parser->state){
00391     case P_LIST:
00392       {
00393         dfsch_object_t *new = dfsch_cons(obj, NULL);
00394 
00395         if (ctx->parser->last){
00396           dfsch_set_cdr(ctx->parser->last, new);
00397         }else{
00398           ctx->parser->front = new;
00399         }
00400         ctx->parser->last = new;
00401         break;
00402       }
00403     case P_DOT:
00404       if (ctx->parser->last){
00405         dfsch_set_cdr(ctx->parser->last, obj);
00406         ctx->parser->state = P_PREEND;
00407         return;
00408       }else{
00409         parser_abort(ctx, "parser:car-expected");
00410       }
00411     case P_QUOTE:
00412       {
00413         dfsch_object_t* tag = ctx->parser->tag;
00414         parser_pop(ctx);
00415         parse_object(ctx, dfsch_cons(tag, dfsch_cons(obj, NULL)));
00416         return;
00417       }
00418     case P_HASH:
00419       parser_pop(ctx);
00420       if ((!obj) || dfsch_pair_p(obj)){
00421         parse_object(ctx, dfsch_list_2_vector(obj));
00422       }else{
00423         parser_abort(ctx, "parser:list-expected");
00424       }
00425       return;
00426     case P_EVAL:
00427       parser_pop(ctx);
00428       if (ctx->env){
00429         parse_object(ctx, dfsch_eval(obj, ctx->env));
00430         /* XXX: What happens when this throws exception is not entirely clear */
00431       }else{
00432         parser_abort(ctx, "parser:evaluation-not-permitted");        
00433       }
00434       return;
00435     case P_DIRECTIVE:
00436       parser_pop(ctx);
00437       process_directive(ctx, obj);
00438       return;
00439     default:
00440       parser_abort(ctx, "parser:unexpected-object");
00441     }
00442   }else{
00443     //    DFSCH_TRY { XXX
00444       if (!(*ctx->callback)(obj,ctx->baton)){
00445         ctx->error = 1;
00446       }
00447       /*} DFSCH_SCATCH(ex) {
00448       parser_abort_ex(ctx, ex);
00449       } DFSCH_SCATCHEND;*/
00450   }
00451 }

00454 static void parse_open(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx){
00455 #ifdef P_DEBUG
00456   printf(";; parse_open\n");
00457 #endif
00458   parser_push(ctx);
00459   ctx->parser->state = P_LIST;
00460   ctx->parser->last = NULL;
00461   ctx->parser->front = NULL;
00462 }
00463 static void parse_quote(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx, dfsch_object_t* tag){
00464 #ifdef P_DEBUG
00465   printf(";; parse_quote\n");
00466 #endif
00467   parser_push(ctx);
00468   ctx->parser->state = P_QUOTE;
00469   ctx->parser->last = NULL;
00470   ctx->parser->front = NULL;
00471   ctx->parser->tag = tag;
00472 }
00473 static void parse_vector(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx){
00474 #ifdef P_DEBUG
00475   printf(";; parse_vector\n");
00476 #endif
00477   parser_push(ctx);
00478   ctx->parser->state = P_HASH;
00479   ctx->parser->last = NULL;
00480   ctx->parser->front = NULL;
00481 }
00482 static void parse_close(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx){
00483 #ifdef P_DEBUG
00484   printf(";; parse_close\n");
00485 #endif
00486   if (ctx->parser && (ctx->parser->state == P_PREEND || 
00487                       ctx->parser->state == P_LIST)){
00488     dfsch_object_t *list;
00489     list = dfsch_list_annotate(ctx->parser->front, 
00490                                ctx->source,
00491                                DFSCH_MAKE_FIXNUM(ctx->line));
00492     parser_pop(ctx);
00493     parse_object(ctx, list);
00494   }else{
00495     parser_abort(ctx, "parser:unexpected-close");
00496   }
00497 }
00498 static void parse_dot(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx){
00499   if (ctx->parser){
00500     ctx->parser->state = P_DOT;
00501   }else{
00502     parser_abort(ctx, "parser:unexpected-dot");
00503   }
00504 }
00505 static void parse_eval(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx){
00506 #ifdef P_DEBUG
00507   printf(";; parse_eval\n");
00508 #endif
00509   parser_push(ctx);
00510   ctx->parser->state = P_EVAL;
00511   ctx->parser->last = NULL;
00512   ctx->parser->front = NULL;
00513 }
00514 static void parse_directive(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx){
00515 #ifdef P_DEBUG
00516   printf(";; parse_directive\n");
00517 #endif
00518   parser_push(ctx);
00519   ctx->parser->state = P_DIRECTIVE;
00520   ctx->parser->last = NULL;
00521   ctx->parser->front = NULL;
00522 }

00526 static void dispatch_string(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx, char *data){
00527   char* out=data;
00528   char* in=data;
00529 
00530   while (*in){
00531     switch (*in){
00532     case '\\':
00533       ++in;
00534       switch (*in){
00535       case '\n':
00536         ++in;
00537         continue;        
00538       case '\r':
00539         ++in;
00540         if (*in == '\n'){
00541           ++in;
00542         }
00543         continue;        
00544       case 'n':
00545         *out = '\n';
00546         ++out;
00547         ++in;
00548         continue;
00549       case 'r':
00550         *out = '\r';
00551         ++out;
00552         ++in;
00553         continue;
00554       case 'a':
00555         *out = '\a';
00556         ++out;
00557         ++in;
00558         continue;
00559       case 't':
00560         *out = '\t';
00561         ++out;
00562         ++in;
00563         continue;
00564       case 'b':
00565         *out = '\b';
00566         ++out;
00567         ++in;
00568         continue;
00569       case 'v':
00570         *out = '\v';
00571         ++out;
00572         ++in;
00573         continue;
00574       case 'f':
00575         *out = '\f';
00576         ++out;
00577         ++in;
00578         continue;
00579       case '0':
00580       case '1':
00581       case '2':
00582       case '3':
00583       case '4':
00584       case '5':
00585       case '6':
00586       case '7':
00587         *out = *in -'0';
00588         ++in;
00589         
00590         if (*in >= '0' && *in <= '7'){
00591           *out = ((*out)<<3) | (*in - '0');
00592           ++in;
00593           if (*in >= '0' && *in <= '7'){
00594             *out = ((*out)<<3) | (*in - '0');
00595             ++in;
00596           }          
00597         }
00598         ++out;
00599         continue;
00600       case 'x':
00601         {
00602           int i;
00603           *out = 0;
00604           ++in;
00605           for (i=0; i<2; i++){
00606             *out <<= 4;
00607             if (!*in){
00608               parser_abort(ctx, "parser:invalid-escape");
00609             }
00610             if (*in >= 'A' && *in <= 'F'){
00611               *out |= *in - 'A' + 10;
00612             }else if (*in >= 'a' && *in <= 'f'){
00613               *out |= *in - 'a' + 10;
00614             }else if (*in >= '0' && *in <= '9'){
00615               *out |= *in - '0';
00616             }else{
00617               parser_abort(ctx, "parser:invalid-escape");
00618             }
00619             ++in;
00620           }
00621           ++out;
00622           continue;
00623         }
00624       case 'u':
00625       case 'U':
00626         {
00627           int i;
00628           uint32_t u = 0;
00629           for (i = (*(in++) == 'U') ? 0 : 4; i<8; i++){ // XXX: clever and ugly
00630             u <<= 4;
00631             if (!*in){
00632               parser_abort(ctx, "parser:invalid-escape");
00633             }
00634             if (*in >= 'A' && *in <= 'F'){
00635               u |= *in - 'A' + 10;
00636             }else if (*in >= 'a' && *in <= 'f'){
00637               u |= *in - 'a' + 10;
00638             }else if (*in >= '0' && *in <= '9'){
00639               u |= *in - '0';
00640             }else{
00641               parser_abort(ctx, "parser:invalid-escape");
00642             }
00643             ++in;
00644           }
00645 
00646           if (u <= 0x7f){
00647             *(out++) = u;
00648           } else if (u <= 0x7ff) {
00649             *(out++) = 0xc0 | ((u >> 6) & 0x1f); 
00650             *(out++) = 0x80 | (u & 0x3f);
00651           } else if (u <= 0xffff) {
00652             *(out++) = 0xe0 | ((u >> 12) & 0x0f); 
00653             *(out++) = 0x80 | ((u >> 6) & 0x3f);
00654             *(out++) = 0x80 | (u & 0x3f);
00655           } else {
00656             *(out++) = 0xf0 | ((u >> 18) & 0x07); 
00657             *(out++) = 0x80 | ((u >> 12) & 0x3f);
00658             *(out++) = 0x80 | ((u >> 6) & 0x3f);
00659             *(out++) = 0x80 | (u & 0x3f);
00660           } 
00661           continue;
00662         }        
00663       default:
00664         *out = *in;
00665         ++out;
00666         ++in;
00667         continue;  
00668       }
00669     default:
00670       *out = *in;
00671       ++out;
00672       ++in;
00673     }
00674   }
00675   
00676   *out = 0;
00677   
00678   dfsch_object_t *s = dfsch_make_string_buf(data, out-data);
00679 
00680   parse_object(ctx, s);
00681 }
00682 static void dispatch_atom(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx, char *data){
00683 #ifdef T_DEBUG
00684   printf(";; Atom: [%s]\n", data);
00685 #endif
00686 
00687   switch (*data){
00688   case '-':
00689   case '+':
00690   case '.':
00691 
00692     if (data[1]<'0' || data[1]>'9')
00693       break;
00694 
00695   case '0':
00696   case '1':
00697   case '2':
00698   case '3':
00699   case '4':
00700   case '5':
00701   case '6':
00702   case '7':
00703   case '8':
00704   case '9':
00705     {
00706       dfsch_object_t *d;
00707       //DFSCH_TRY {   XXX
00708         d = dfsch_make_number_from_string(data, 0);
00709         /*} DFSCH_CATCH(ex) {
00710         parser_abort_ex(ctx, ex);
00711         } DFSCH_END_TRY;*/
00712       if (!d) {
00713         parser_abort(ctx, "parser:invalid-number");
00714       }
00715       parse_object(ctx, d);
00716       return;
00717     }
00718   }
00719 
00720   dfsch_object_t *d = make_symbol(ctx, data);
00721 
00722   parse_object(ctx,d);
00723 }
00724 
00725 #ifdef T_DEBUG
00726 #define STATE_TRANS(state) printf(";; State transition: %s\n",#state)
00727 #else
00728 #define STATE_TRANS(state)
00729 #endif
00730 
00731 /*
00732  * It's probably wise to somehow generalize this routine in order to support
00733  * "normal" scheme ports and such things.
00734  */
00735 static void tokenizer_process (dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx, char* data){
00736   while (*data){
00737     switch (ctx->tokenizer_state){
00738     case T_NONE:
00739       while(*data==' ' || *data=='\n' || *data == '\t' || *data == '\r' 
00740             || *data == '\f'){
00741         ctx->column++;
00742         if (*data == '\n'){
00743           ctx->column = 1;
00744           ctx->line++;
00745         
00746         }
00747         ++data;
00748       }
00749       switch (*data){
00750       case 0:
00751         empty_queue(ctx->q);
00752         return;
00753       case '"':
00754         ++data;
00755         ctx->column++;
00756 
00757         ctx->tokenizer_state = T_STRING;
00758         break;
00759       case '(':
00760         ++data;
00761         ctx->column++;
00762         
00763         parse_open(ctx);
00764         if (ctx->error) return;
00765 
00766         break;
00767       case '\'':
00768         ++data;
00769         ctx->column++;
00770         
00771         parse_quote(ctx, DFSCH_SYM_QUOTE);
00772         if (ctx->error) return;
00773 
00774         break;
00775       case '`':
00776         ++data;
00777         ctx->column++;
00778 
00779         
00780         parse_quote(ctx, DFSCH_SYM_QUASIQUOTE);
00781         if (ctx->error) return;
00782 
00783         break;
00784       case ',':
00785         ++data;
00786         ctx->column++;  
00787 
00788         if (*data == '@'){
00789           ++data;
00790           ctx->column++;
00791         
00792           parse_quote(ctx, DFSCH_SYM_UNQUOTE_SPLICING); 
00793         }else{
00794           parse_quote(ctx, DFSCH_SYM_UNQUOTE);
00795         }
00796         if (ctx->error) return;
00797 
00798         break;
00799       case '#':
00800         ++data;
00801         ctx->column++;
00802 
00803         ctx->tokenizer_state = T_HASH;  
00804         break;
00805 
00806       case ')':
00807         ++data;
00808         ctx->column++;
00809         
00810         parse_close(ctx);
00811         if (ctx->error) return;
00812 
00813         break;
00814       case ';':
00815         ++data;
00816         ctx->column++;
00817 
00818         ctx->tokenizer_state = T_COMMENT;       
00819         break;
00820       case '.':
00821         ++data;
00822 
00823         if (*data == ' ' || *data=='\n' || *data=='\t' || *data=='\r' ||
00824             *data == '\f' || *data==0   || *data=='('  || *data==')'){
00825           ctx->column++;
00826           parse_dot(ctx);
00827           if (ctx->error) return;
00828           
00829           break;
00830         }
00831         --data;
00832       default:
00833         ctx->tokenizer_state = T_ATOM;
00834         STATE_TRANS(T_ATOM);
00835         break;  
00836       }
00837       break;
00838     case T_ATOM:
00839       {
00840         char *e = strpbrk(data, "() \t\n\r\f;");
00841         if (!e){
00842           consume_queue(ctx->q, data);
00843           return;
00844         }
00845         char *s = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC((size_t)(e-data)+1);
00846         strncpy(s,data,e-data);
00847         s[e-data]=0;
00848 
00849         dispatch_atom(ctx, s);
00850         if (ctx->error) return;
00851 
00852         ctx->column += e-data;
00853         data = e;
00854         ctx->tokenizer_state = T_NONE;
00855         STATE_TRANS(T_NONE);
00856         break;
00857       }
00858     case T_STRING: // TODO: count characters and lines
00859       {
00860         char *e= strchr(data, '"');
00861         if (!e){
00862           consume_queue(ctx->q, data);
00863           return;
00864         }
00865         if (e>data){
00866           while (*(e-1)=='\\'){
00867             e = strchr(e+1, '"');
00868           }
00869         }
00870 
00871         char *s = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC((size_t)(e-data)+1);
00872         strncpy(s, data, e-data);
00873         s[e-data]=0;
00874 
00875         dispatch_string(ctx, s);
00876         if (ctx->error) return;
00877 
00878         data = e+1;
00879         
00880         ctx->tokenizer_state = T_NONE;
00881         break;
00882      }
00883     case T_COMMENT:
00884       while (*data){
00885         if (*data=='\n'){
00886           ctx->tokenizer_state = T_NONE;
00887           ctx->column = 1;
00888           ctx->line++;
00889           break;
00890         }
00891         ++data;
00892         ctx->column++;
00893       }
00894       break;
00895     case T_HASH:
00896       switch(*data){
00897       case 'n':
00898       case 'f':
00899       case 'N':
00900       case 'F':
00901         ++data;
00902         ctx->column++;
00903 
00904         parse_object(ctx,NULL);
00905         if (ctx->error) return;
00906         ctx->tokenizer_state = T_NONE;
00907         break;
00908       case 't':
00909       case 'T':
00910         ++data;
00911         ctx->column++;
00912 
00913         parse_object(ctx,DFSCH_SYM_TRUE);
00914         if (ctx->error) return;
00915         ctx->tokenizer_state = T_NONE;  
00916         break;
00917       case '\\':
00918         ++data;
00919         ctx->column++;
00920 
00921         ctx->tokenizer_state = T_CHAR;
00922         break;
00923       case '(':
00924         parse_vector(ctx);
00925         if (ctx->error) return;
00926         ctx->tokenizer_state = T_NONE;
00927         break;
00928       case '<':
00929         parser_abort(ctx, "parser:unreadable");
00930         return;        
00931       case '!': /* for shebang */
00932         ++data;
00933         ctx->column++;
00934         ctx->tokenizer_state = T_COMMENT;
00935         break;
00936       case ',':
00937         ++data;
00938         ctx->column++;
00939         parse_directive(ctx);
00940         ctx->tokenizer_state = T_NONE;
00941         break;
00942       case '.':
00943         ++data;
00944         ctx->column++;
00945         parse_eval(ctx);
00946         ctx->tokenizer_state = T_NONE;
00947         break;
00948       default:
00949         parser_abort(ctx, "parser:invalid-escape");
00950         return;
00951       }
00952       break;
00953     case T_CHAR:
00954       {
00955         unsigned char c = *data;
00956         if ((c>='a' && c<= 'z') || (c>='A' && c<= 'Z')){
00957           char *e = strpbrk(data, "() \t\n\r\f;");
00958           if (!e){
00959             consume_queue(ctx->q, data);
00960             return;
00961           }
00962           if (e - data ==  1) // One character
00963             goto simple;
00964 
00965           char *s = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC((size_t)(e-data)+1);
00966           int i;
00967 
00968           strncpy(s, data, e-data);
00969           ctx->column += e-data;
00970           s[e-data]=0;
00971           
00972           for (i=0; i < sizeof(char_table)/sizeof(char_table_entry_t); i++){
00973 
00974             if (ascii_strcasecmp(s, char_table[i].name)==0){
00975               parse_object(ctx, dfsch_make_number_from_long(char_table[i].ch));
00976               if (ctx->error) return;
00977               goto char_out;
00978             }
00979           } 
00980 
00981           parser_abort(ctx, "parser:invalid-escape");
00982 
00983         char_out:
00984           data = e;
00985           ctx->tokenizer_state = T_NONE;
00986           break;
00987           
00988         }else{
00989         simple:
00990           ++data;
00991           ctx->column++;
00992           if (c < 0x80){
00993             parse_object(ctx, dfsch_make_number_from_long(c));
00994             ctx->tokenizer_state = T_NONE;
00995           } else {
00996             long ch;
00997 
00998             if ((c & 0xe0) == 0xc0 && (c & 0x1f) != 0x00){
00999               if (*data == 0){
01000                 consume_queue(ctx->q, data-1);
01001                 return;
01002               }
01003               if ((*data & 0xc0) != 0x80){
01004                 parser_abort(ctx, "parser:invalid-unicode-character0");
01005               }
01006               ch = (c & 0x1f);
01007               ch <<= 6;
01008               ch |= (*data & 0x3f);
01009               data++;
01010             } else if ((c & 0xf0) == 0xe0 && (c & 0x0f) != 0x00){
01011               if (data[0] == 0 || data[1] == 0){
01012                 consume_queue(ctx->q, data-1);
01013                 return;
01014               }
01015               if ((data[1] & 0xc0) != 0x80 || (data[1] & 0xc0) != 0x80){
01016                 parser_abort(ctx, "parser:invalid-unicode-character1");
01017               }
01018               ch = (c & 0x0f);
01019               ch <<= 6;
01020               ch |= (*data & 0x3f);
01021               data++;
01022               ch <<= 6;
01023               ch |= (*data & 0x3f);
01024               data++;
01025             } else if ((c & 0xf8) == 0xf0 && (c & 0x07) != 0x00){
01026               if (data[0] == 0 || data[1] == 0 || data[2] == 0){
01027                 consume_queue(ctx->q, data-1);
01028                 return;
01029               }
01030               if ((data[0] & 0xc0) != 0x80 ||
01031                   (data[1] & 0xc0) != 0x80 || 
01032                   (data[2] & 0xc0) != 0x80){
01033                 parser_abort(ctx, "parser:invalid-unicode-character2");
01034               }
01035               ch = (c & 0x07);
01036               ch <<= 6;
01037               ch |= (*data & 0x3f);
01038               data++;
01039               ch <<= 6;
01040               ch |= (*data & 0x3f);
01041               data++;
01042               ch <<= 6;
01043               ch |= (*data & 0x3f);
01044               data++;
01045             } else {
01046               parser_abort(ctx, "parser:invalid-unicode-character3");
01047             }
01048 
01049             parse_object(ctx, dfsch_make_number_from_long(ch));
01050             ctx->tokenizer_state = T_NONE;
01051           }
01052           break;          
01053         }
01054       }
01055     }
01056   }
01057 
01058   consume_queue(ctx->q, data);
01059 }
01060 
01061 int dfsch_parser_feed(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx, char* data){
01062   ctx->error = 0;
01063   DFSCH_UNWIND{
01064   feed_queue(ctx->q, data);
01065 
01066   tokenizer_process(ctx, get_queue(ctx->q));
01067   }DFSCH_PROTECT{
01068     
01069   }DFSCH_UNWIND_DETECT{
01070     parser_reset(ctx);
01071   }DFSCH_PROTECT_END;
01072 
01073   return ctx->error;
01074 }
01075 int dfsch_parser_feed_line(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx, char* data){
01076   int ret;
01077   if (ret = dfsch_parser_feed(ctx, data)){
01078     return ret;
01079   }
01080   return dfsch_parser_feed(ctx, "\n");
01081 }
01082 
01083 
01084 char* dfsch_parser_feed_catch(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx, char* data){
01085   char *ret = NULL;
01086   
01087   dfsch_parser_feed(ctx, data);
01088     
01089   return ret;
01090 }
01091 
01092 int dfsch_parser_get_level(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx){
01093   return ctx->level;
01094 }
01095 
01096 void dfsch_parser_reset(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx){
01097   empty_queue(ctx->q);
01098   ctx->tokenizer_state = T_NONE;
01099   ctx->parser = NULL;
01100   ctx->level = 0 ;
01101   ctx->error = 0;
01102 }
01103 
01104 void dfsch_parser_set_source(dfsch_parser_ctx_t* ctx, dfsch_object_t* source){
01105   ctx->source = source;
01106 }
01107 
01108 int dfsch_parser_top_level(dfsch_parser_ctx_t *ctx){
01109   return (ctx->parser == NULL) & (ctx->tokenizer_state == T_NONE);
01110 }
01111 
01112 static int read_callback(dfsch_object_t* obj, dfsch_object_t** res){
01113   *res = obj;
01114   return 0;
01115 }
01116 
01117 /*
01118  * There is slight bug - when first character after atom is (, ) or ;
01119  * it's silently thrown away. This clearly is undesired behavior, but
01120  * in my opinion does not break anyhing significant. So let's call it 
01121  * feature for now.
01122  */
01123 
01124 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_parser_read_from_port(dfsch_object_t* port){
01125   dfsch_parser_ctx_t* parser = dfsch_parser_create();
01126   int ch;
01127   char buf[2];
01128   dfsch_object_t* res;
01129   int ok = 0;
01130 
01131   dfsch_port_batch_read_start(port);
01132   dfsch_parser_callback(parser, read_callback, &res);
01133   DFSCH_UNWIND {
01134     while ((ch = dfsch_port_batch_read(port)) != -1){
01135       buf[0] = ch;
01136       buf[1] = 0;
01137       
01138       if (dfsch_parser_feed(parser, buf)){
01139         dfsch_port_batch_read_end(port);
01140         ok = 1;
01141         break;
01142       }
01143     }
01144   } DFSCH_PROTECT {
01145     dfsch_port_batch_read_end(port);
01146   } DFSCH_PROTECT_END;
01147   if (ok){
01148     return res;
01149   }
01150   if (dfsch_parser_top_level(parser)){
01151     return dfsch_eof_object();
01152   } else {
01153     dfsch_error("parser:unexpected-end-of-file", port);
01154   }
01155 }
